name: Olksandr Petrychuk
education: Kharkiv Petro Vasylenko National Technical University
summaryText: I am a switcher. Currently I'm combining part-time development with non-related to software full-time job. Looking for a full-time frontend (or even fullstack trainee) role.
stackList: Bootstrap, Tailwind, SASS, LESS, CSS modules
ES6+, React.js, React Styled comp-s, React-redux (+toolkit), Node.js (Express.js, MongoDB)
projectsSectionSummary: For last few years I've participated a couple of projects and made some by my own (e.g. this CV). Here's a few:

project_1.title: DataStash
project_1.subtitle: Built with React.js (TS) and GCP (Google Auth and Firestore). Provide 1-3 inputs and "secret key" and your data will be encoded and sent to DB.

project_2.title: Rapid News
project_2.subtitle: Built with React.js and Sass in BW color scheme. Search, choose language for your results. Hover over element to see description, click to read

project_3.title: Quiz
project_3.subtitle: Built with React.js and Bootstrap (no custom styles). Press "Start", get 10 questions and try your best!.

experienceSubtitle: Irrelevant experience. I have previously held (for 10+ years) various roles both as an employee (in teams of different sizes) and as a self-employed person in various industries.

experiencePeriodLatest.brief: Creating landing pages, web-portfolios and web-applications of any comlexity. Familiar with “Pixel Perfect”-methodology. Flexibility and accessibility – by default.

experiencePeriodPrevious.brief: Designing and developing python-based bots and desktop apps. Collecting and processing data.
